title: T206 For Sale: Matty, Chesbro, Murphy, Dunn (Horizontals)

posts.post_title: T206 For Sale: Matty, Chesbro, Murphy, Dunn (Horizontals)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Cy
Hi,

I have four T206 cards for sale. Click on the links to view the cards.

Chesbro is quite in the SGC 50 holder. Beautiful for the grade.
[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-086b.jpg"] 86 Jack Chesbro
Price: $230
Back: Piedmont 150[/URL]

Matty Dark Cap is in lower grade. But it is an inexpensive way to get a Matty with an Old Mill back.
[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-2981b.jpg"] 298 Christy Mathewson(Dark)
Price: $200
Back: Old Mill[/URL]

Dunn is a nice VG-Ex card. This is a difficult card to find. Horizontal? No one knows for sure.
[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-149b.jpg"] 149 Jack Dunn(Balt)
Price: $50
Back: Piedmont 350[/URL]

Murphy is a tough true horizontal. It is stained buy uncreased. The price is right for this card.
[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-342b.jpg"] 342 Danny Murphy(Throwing)
Price: $35
Back: Piedmont 150[/URL]

If you would like to buy any or all of these, you can send me an E-mail at:

cy@cyscards.com

Thanks for looking.

Cy
